title: Critical Reflection-Based Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Architectural Design-Construction Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of architectural design and construction processes
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing field-centered practical learning. Learners investigate methods to resolve problems arising throughout the design-to-construction process through critical reflection

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problems occurring in the architectural design-construction process through critical reflection
Learners can establish linkage strategies between design and construction by utilizing microlearning content provided in mobile environments
Learners can propose architectural practice approaches considering social and environmental responsibilities through small-group team-based activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
